text: "Maybe That's All It Takes" is a song recorded by American country music artist Don Williams. It was released in June 1990 as the fourth single from the album One Good Well. The song reached #22 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Beth Nielsen Chapman. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1990) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|47 |} ==References== Category:1990 singles Category:1989 songs Category:Don Williams songs Category:Songs written by Beth Nielsen Chapman Category:Song recordings produced by Garth Fundis
title: Maybe That's All It Takes
